mapper.update: update l_blanklist set keyid=keyid ,refid=#{refid} ,blanklisttype=#{blanklisttype} ,reason=#{reason} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,spstate=#{spstate} where keyid=#{keyid}

update l_blanklist set keyid=keyid ,refid=#{refid} ,blanklisttype=#{blanklisttype} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,reason=#{reason} ,remark=#{remark} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,spstate=#{spstate} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and refid=#{Where_refid} and blanklisttype=#{Where_blanklisttype} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and reason=#{Where_reason} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and spstate=#{Where_spstate}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.refid "refid", t.blanklisttype "blanklisttype", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.reason "reason", t.remark "remark", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.spstate "spstate" from l_blanklist t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.refid "refid", t.blanklisttype "blanklisttype", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.reason "reason", t.remark "remark", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.spstate "spstate" from l_blanklist t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.refid=#{refid} and t.blanklisttype=#{blanklisttype} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.reason=#{reason} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.spstate=#{spstate}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.refid "refid", t.blanklisttype "blanklisttype", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.reason "reason", t.remark "remark", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.spstate "spstate" from l_blanklist t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.refid=#{refid} and t.blanklisttype=#{blanklisttype} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.reason=#{reason} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.spstate=#{spstate}
mapper.delete: delete from l_blanklist where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and refid=#{Where_refid} and blanklisttype=#{Where_blanklisttype} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and reason=#{Where_reason} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and spstate=#{Where_spstate}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.refid "refid", t.blanklisttype "blanklisttype", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.reason "reason", t.remark "remark", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.spstate "spstate", bu1.username "createusername", bu2.username "spusername" ,li.name "name" ,li.idcard "idcard" ,li.address "address" ,li.phone "phone" ,li.trucknum "trucknum" ,lt.tradername "tradername" ,lt.businessscope "businessscope" ,lt.linkman "linkman" ,lt.telnumber "telnumber" from l_blanklist t left join l_individual li on li.individualid=t.refid left join l_trader lt on lt.traderid=t.refid left join base_user bu1 on bu1.userid=t.createuserid left join base_user bu2 on bu2.userid=t.spuserid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.refid=#{refid} and t.blanklisttype=#{blanklisttype} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.reason=#{reason} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.spstate=#{spstate}

select count(*) from l_blanklist t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.refid=#{refid} and t.blanklisttype=#{blanklisttype} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.reason=#{reason} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.spstate=#{spstate}
